title: 17. How Does Retirement Affect Your Brain?
description: Aging carries a risk of losing our memory, focus, and ability to take care of ourselves and others. Does leaving the workforce worsen that risk? We investigate the research. And…Bapu asks: is it time for dad to retire?
author: bapu@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
